raw_comment:
I notice that the younger groups are optimistic on how they view different generations. There's various countries with no similar political or economic agenda that have participated in this survey.

I wonder why the older generations don't think the world is getting better ? What is causing them to believe that ? What cause the newer generation to have views of a better future and will the older generation and new ever see eye to eye ?

This relates to me and my community because there's adults in the community that think the younger generation is disruptive, uneducated and very ignorant but lots of the newer ones think they're making a big piracy because they know to speak up , attend protests and allow fort themselves to be heard.

A title for this could be "Same Age Once ; Difference in Views"
ace_sentences: I notice that younger groups are optimistic about different generations.
Various countries participated in this survey.
These countries do not have a similar political agenda.
These countries do not have a similar economic agenda.
I wonder why older generations do not think that the world is getting better.
I wonder what causes older generations to believe that the world is not getting better.
I wonder what causes younger generations to have views of a better future.
I wonder whether older generations and younger generations will ever see eye to eye.
This relates to me and my community.
Some adults in my community think that the younger generation is disruptive.
Some adults in my community think that the younger generation is uneducated.
Some adults in my community think that the younger generation is ignorant.
Many younger people in my community think that they are making a big difference.
Many younger people in my community know how to speak up.
Many younger people in my community attend protests.
Many younger people in my community allow themselves to be heard.
The title could be "Same Age Once ; Difference in Views".
